nodes.text: Kessel Wheel was a game named for the planet Kessel which could be gambled upon. It could be played at the bar Alcazar in the city of Myrra on the planet Akiva. If one were to lose their pants betting on Kessel Wheel in Alcazar, then they would be thrown out of the establishment's "shame door" into the alleys outside.
Kessel Wheel was first mentioned in the novel Aftermath, which was written by Chuck Wendig and released in 2015.
